content: What is your strategic focus this quarter?

This quarter, my strategic focus is to align our organizational priorities with the vision of VBoarder. I will make go/no-go decisions on major initiatives and set annual strategic objectives, ensuring all functional strategies (tech, finance, ops, marketing, legal) are in line with the overall direction. Additionally, I will adjust strategy based on market feedback and performance data to ensure we're delivering value to clients while building a scalable, resilient organization.
